entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Quesnel
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:34 AM PST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -5.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Quesnel Airport 2:58 PM PST Tuesday 31 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -5.0°C
Pressure: 101.9 kPa
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -6.5°C
Wind: SSE 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2
